member.name: T:RSSVE.InstallChecker
member.summary: Version and filesystem integrity checker class. Operates only in the Main Menu scene.

member.name: M:RSSVE.InstallChecker.Start
member.summary: Method to start the installation checker.

member.name: T:RSSVE.Constants
member.summary: Class to set up the parameters required and used by RSSVE.

member.name: T:RSSVE.Constants.VersionCompatible
member.summary: Version parameters struct.

member.name: F:RSSVE.Constants.VersionCompatible.Major
member.summary: The major version value.

member.name: F:RSSVE.Constants.VersionCompatible.Minor
member.summary: The minor version value.

member.name: F:RSSVE.Constants.VersionCompatible.Revis
member.summary: The revision version value.

member.name: F:RSSVE.Constants.VersionCompatible.Build
member.summary: The build version value.

member.name: F:RSSVE.Constants.UnityVersion
member.summary: The compatible Unity version.

member.name: F:RSSVE.Constants.AssemblyName
member.summary: The name of the assembly (used as a tag for the notification dialogs and the log file).

member.name: F:RSSVE.Constants.AssemblyPath
member.summary: The relative path where the assembly resides.

member.name: T:RSSVE.Notification
member.summary: Class to create user notification dialogs and log basic information to the KSP log file.

member.name: M:RSSVE.Notification.Dialog(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method to create popup notification dialogs.

member.name: M:RSSVE.Notification.Logger(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method to print generic text in the KSP debug log.

member.name: T:RSSVE.System
member.summary: Class to get basic system operational parameters.

member.name: P:RSSVE.System.GetGraphicsRenderer
member.summary: Method to get the operating system graphics renderer.
member.returns: Returns one of the following renderer types: D3D9, D3D11, OpenGL or Unknown.

member.name: P:RSSVE.System.Is64BitOS
member.summary: Method to get the operating system octet size.
member.returns: Returns true if the Operating System is using the AMD64 specification (x64) and false if it is using the baseline x86.

member.name: P:RSSVE.System.GetPlatformType
member.summary: Method to get the operating system type.
member.returns: Returns the following operating system types: Linux, OSX, Windows and Unknown.

member.name: T:RSSVE.Version
member.summary: Class to get the assembly version information.

member.name: P:RSSVE.Version.GetAssemblyVersion
member.summary: Method to get the assembly version.
member.returns: Returns the assembly version as a string (major.minor.revision.build).

member.name: T:RSSVE.StartupChecker
member.summary: Startup System checker. Operates only in the Loading scene.

member.name: M:RSSVE.StartupChecker.Start
member.summary: Method to start the startup checker.
